text.title: Accumulation of Variants
text.long: Shows the cumulative total of submitted variants. Based on the current release date. Due to the nature of the data in ClinVar (occasional bulk submissions from large repositories), newer releases dates of the ClinVar database can contain New variants with submission dates prior to previous database release dates.

metadata.author: Bret Heale
metadata.notes: TSV is based on most current version. Each version of ClinVar is DISTINCT! Later versions can even have varaints with submission dates that pre-date ClinVar! This graph is a good example to play with to explore having distinct views based on display context (in this case large or small size. Initial version by Lance.
